EmailTemplate.name: 201903_Global_Email_GoDirectDatalinkLite_Campaign_TM.201903_Global_Email_GoDirec
EmailTemplate.subject: New Low-Cost Datalink Plan Takes 5 Minutes to Setup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DataLink_Lite_2018.html]]> Low Cost. Low Maintenance. Ask for GoDirect Datalink Lite. Interested in datalink services for your aircraft, but don’t want the more expensive monthly fee? It’s time to give the new low-cost datalink plan from Honeywell a look.
This new service package is designed for business and general aviation operators who fly shorter routes and provides real-time datalink communications for the cockpit. It also reduces pre-flight pilot workload by uploading flight plans directly into the aircraft’s flight management system.
Learn more and get signed up today. It takes less than 5 minutes to get enrolled.
GET STARTED <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DataLink_Lite.html]]>
*Notice: Existing GoDirect Datalink customers are not eligible for the datalink lite. Datalink Lite is available on select platforms only.
